document.docAuthor: Bezděčková, Klára, Bezděčka, Pavel & Machar, Ivo
document.masterDocTitle: A checklist of the ants (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) of Peru

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A checklist of the ants (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) of Peru

subSubSection.paragraph:
474
Anochetus inca
Wheeler W. M., 1925
: Peru (
Fernandez & Sendoya 2004
,
Bolton et al. 2007
); “Loreto, Río Charapa” (
Escalante Gutiérrez 1993
); Rio Charape (t. l.,
Kempf 1972 a
).
